title: Scrooge: A Christmas Carol (1935) Charles Dickens Story - Directed by Henry Edwards

sources.title: Scrooge: A Christmas Carol (1935) Charles Dickens Story - Directed by Henry Edwards
sources.description:
A miserly heart gets one unforgettable night to rewrite Christmas itself.
On Christmas Eve in Victorian London, hard-edged moneylender Ebenezer Scrooge (Seymour Hicks) shuts out the season, his clerk Bob Cratchit (Donald Calthrop), and his hopeful nephew Fred (Robert Cochran), clinging to his coins and his solitude. That night, Scrooge is guided by the Spirits of Christmas Past, Present, and Future through lost love, family hardship, and a stark glimpse of what awaits him if he refuses to change, leading to a joyful, generous rebirth by Christmas morning.

Original title: Scrooge
Alternative title: A Christmas Carol

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/OX_-4yABrc4
